text: On the 78th anniversary of #DDay, we honor the brave American & Allied forces who arrived on the coast of Normandy to liberate Europe from tyranny. The heroism of these service members changed the course of world history. Their legacy will never be forgotten. https://t.co/7ix0eWdH1F

While a step in the right direction, this dispute reflects the risks of letting paperwork get in the way of sound policy. Congress must ensure our laws incentivize clean energy deployment & not create bureaucratic loopholes that can be easily exploited. 

https://t.co/xqykL02fuJ

Last month, I led 85 Members of Congress urging the Commerce Department to stop the harmful solar inquiry. @POTUS’ actions today will help deploy U.S. solar, create good-paying energy jobs, reduce climate pollution, and boost grid reliability.

https://t.co/eICMWm57SX

Today, in response to a broad coalition of lawmakers, companies, environmental and labor groups, @POTUS took a much-needed step to provide regulatory certainty for the U.S. solar industry. 

https://t.co/jbOYBfg8ly

The first and most important thing we must do to honor survivors & victims of gun violence is pass laws that keep this from happening again. As we mark #NationalGunViolenceAwarenessMonth, the call to action has never been louder. We must act now. https://t.co/MRG2jrEC4z

Happy #Pride Month! We celebrate the strength & joy of the LGBTQ+ community. While the relentless fight for equality continues, much work lies ahead. It’s time for the #EqualityAct to be signed into law to ensure basic protections for every American, no matter who they are. https://t.co/VD0a9pPncl

This community is the result of years of hard work in San Diego & Washington, D.C. Our job in government is to provide resources to help rebuild lives. Let's keep up this momentum to deliver safe housing and opportunities for success for those in need.

Housing prices & homelessness are concerns for all of us.

San Diego thanks @SenAlexPadilla for visiting @FatherJoes’ St. Teresa of Calcutta Villa yesterday. This 270-unit development is a lifeline for those like Albert, a resident I met who found hope after adversity. https://t.co/szIAI23RCr
